Container.Name: binhex-rclone
Container.Overview: Rclone is a command line program to manage files on cloud storage. It is a feature rich alternative to cloud vendors web storage interfaces. Over 40 cloud storage products support rclone including S3 object stores, business and consumer file storage services, as well as standard transfer protocols. Rclone has powerful cloud equivalents to the unix commands rsync, cp, mv, mount, ls, ncdu, tree, rm, and cat. Rclone's familiar syntax includes shell pipeline support, and --dry-run protection. It is used at the command line, in scripts or via its API. Users call rclone The Swiss army knife of cloud storage, and Technology indistinguishable from magic.

Config.Name: Variable: RCLONE_CONFIG_PATH
Config.Description: Specify the file path to your preconfigured rclone configuration file.

Config.Name: Variable: RCLONE_MEDIA_SHARES
Config.Description: Specify the media shares to process in rclone.

Config.Name: Variable: RCLONE_REMOTE_NAME
Config.Description: Specify the remote name as defined in the rclone configuration file.

Config.Name: Variable: RCLONE_SLEEP_PERIOD
Config.Description: Specify the delay between re-runs of rclone.

Config.Name: Variable: RCLONE_OPERATION
Config.Description: Specify whether to copy new files or syncronise, syncronise may cause delete operation so use with caution.

Config.Name: Variable: RCLONE_DIRECTION
Config.Description: Specify the direction to syncronise, local to remote, remote to local or two way sync.

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_WEBUI

Config.Name: Variable: WEBUI_USER
Config.Description: Specify the rclone Web UI username.

Config.Name: Variable: WEBUI_PASS
Config.Description: Specify the rclone Web UI password.

Config.Name: Variable: RCLONE_USER_FLAGS
Config.Description: Specify any additional user defined flags for rclone.

Config.Name: Variable: RCLONE_POST_CHECK
Config.Description: Specify whether to verify local and remote files match.

Config.Name: Variable: RCLONE_POST_REPORT
Config.Description: Specify what post check level to report.
